title: Warm Time With You
overview: Dorama tells the story of Wu Jiao Jiao, who single-handedly runs a martial arts hall left to her by her parents and takes care of a child left behind by her missing, after an accident, sister. Although her life is poor, the joy that bringing up a child brings compensates for hard work and exhaustion. Although the protagonist Qi Mo comes from a wealthy family, he has never enjoyed the warmth of his family. In order to win his family's approval, he happened to be in Jiao Jiao's martial arts hall, and an ironic, warm and healing story happened.
